body.query: FROM b* | EVAL c = CASE(f::BOOLEAN, "a", "b") | SORT a ASC | LIMIT 10

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.16.2-70a58d5aded9fe84b19607a9af210c87b8e538eb "Line 1:25: evaluation of [f] failed, treating result as false. Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-8.16.2-70a58d5aded9fe84b19607a9af210c87b8e538eb "Line 1:25: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: CASE expects a single-valued boolean"
